title: Introducing: True Adventures
body:
Sam Keith Leonard AKA **True Adventures** is a Norwich based singer/songwriter.

His latest track, _North Atlantic Ocean_, tells a tale of love, hope and ambition captured within the monotony of the daily grind. A talented lyricist , this definitely isn’t a typical story of a broken-heart. If you’re into Sam’s music (or even if you’re not..), he makes pretty badass scout badges which are available [here](https://trueadventures.bandcamp.com/merch/scout-badge-and-cd-single)
